title: What I Learned From Linux and Free Software
description:
This special live event will be me discussing my Linux desktop experience, and what I've learned over the years thanks to Linux.  Also, I will be interacting with those of you hanging out in the YouTube.  I may respond to questions and comments...if they aren't too ridiculous.  ;)
